The conflict with things already installed. like it wants its own rdesktop client
then your best bet is to rebuild the package. Grab the source package and rebuild.  See ubottu

that's probably the best thing to do.  The other alternative is to use the "equivs" package to create a fake package for the dependencies and install that, but I would not recommend this as it just clutters your install
